activities: Personal Information may be transferred from the EU to the U.S. for employees who reside and work outside of the U.S including current and former employees and job applicants. Such information may include the employee’s home address, email address, phone number, salary, other compensation history, incentive plans, biographical information and background checks, demographic information and other records in the employee’s personnel file. JWT collects and processes this information for business purposes such as administering employee programs and benefits, compensation purposes, recruitment for open positions, reviewing and evaluating performances and conducting internal employee programs.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, United Kingdom
